# python3

def optimal(n):
    if(n >= 5):
        res = 5
    elif(n < 5 and n >= 3):
        res = 3
    elif(n < 3 and n >= 1):
        res = 1
    elif(n < 1):
        return -1
    return res

if __name__ == "__main__":
    count = -1
    l = []
    test = int(raw_input())
    while(test):
        n = int(raw_input())
        while(n):
            z = optimal(n)
            n = n - z
            count = count + 1
        if(count % 2 == 0):
            l.append(0)
        else:
            l.append(1)
        count = -1
        test = test - 1

    for i in l:
        if(i == 0):
            print "JENNY"
        else:
            print "JACK"
